alert.note: Alert for Marinette; Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:48PM CDT until May 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Marinette County in northeastern Wisconsin... North central Oconto County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 348 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Menominee, Crivitz, Wausaukee, Pound, Porterfield, Beaver, Middle Inlet, Coleman, Athelstane and Mcallister. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
